Text: You did it again !!!  Thx B, and to all of you....boring "complainers", does your world really fall apart if there is a few extra clicks to get the movie running/in full screen etc........Buy the film right away then and quit yappi'n......   Sorry B, for using this comment box to complain, but serious....... are'nt there more urgent things in the world to complain about..... Once again, thx , great work.....
